ow.stat
インタフェース MessagingCollector

既知の実装クラスの一覧:
MessagingCollectorImpl
public interface MessagingCollector

An interface through which an application collect statistical information from the messaging subsystem.

メソッドの概要
 ID getID(MessagingAddress address)
          Returns the ID of the node having the specified address.
 MessageReceiver getMessageReceiver()
           
 MessagingProvider getMessagingProvider()
           
 void start(MessagingCallback callback)
          Registers a callback and start this statistics collector.
 void stop()
          Stops this statistics collector.
 

メソッドの詳細

           throws java.lang.Exception

stop

void stop()
Stops this statistics collector.
